summary: Now Alduin becomes the REAL black dragon he wasn't.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/77975-0-1480359395.jpg[/img]
First of this is not a "HD" mod, I have only made a few changes to the original textures.
(except the eye that texture is totaly remade)

Okay I made this reskin because i always found it funny that the npc's in the game says that he's a black dragon, when they are totaly WRROOONG!!!.
So now instead of purple/grey-ish color, he is [b]REAL[/b] black.

The textures are 2K and the eye textures are 512x512 
So its basic the same size as orginal except the eye which was 64x64 (extreme low)

MOD Review by Devix1996 aka NorthWind :)
[youtube]NKgeY-Jzx3A[/youtube]

Also check out my other mods
